channel.title: Saml on icahoon.im
channel.description: Recent content in Saml on icahoon.im

item.title: SAML RFCs
item.description: To read in no particlar order: RFC 7521, Assertion Framework for OAuth 2.0 Client Authentication and Authorization Grants RFC 7522, Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 2.0 Profile for OAuth 2.0 Client Authentication and Authorization Grants RFC 6749, The OAuth 2.0 Authorization Framework RFC 6750, The OAuth 2.0 Authorization Framework: Bearer Token Usage RFC 2616, Hypertext Transfer Protocol – HTTP/1.1 RFC 2246, The TLS Protocol Version 1.0 RFC 5246, The Transport Layer Security (TLS) Protocol Version 1.
